name: fundacionfavorita
description: This is a demo for node.je Express (ejs) with mssql

scripts.prod: git pull origin main && npm i --prod && sudo pm2 stop ServiciosBancoAlimentos.js && sudo pm2 start ServiciosBancoAlimentos.js --name ServiciosBancoAlimentos && sudo pm2 save
scripts.prodinit: git pull origin main && npm i --prod && sudo pm2 start ServiciosBancoAlimentos.js --name ServiciosBancoAlimentos && sudo pm2 save

author: Saul Ibarra
